meta.title: From SO to CLOVER
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: So Clover is a word party game where you're given four random pairs of words and have to clue them each with one word. Similar to Codenames, except in this case it's co-op, and due to the physical design, your teammates have to solve all four clues at once. Games go really fast, and when you're done, you can just redraw cards and start again.
